mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (email, password, name, phone, active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{active}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO instructors (member_id, affiliation, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{affiliation}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO students (member_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT members.*, instructors.id as instructor_id, instructors.affiliation FROM members JOIN instructors ON members.id = instructors.member_id WHERE members.active = false LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM members JOIN instructors ON members.id = instructors.member_id WHERE members.active = false

mapper.update: UPDATE members SET active = #{active} WHERE id = (SELECT member_id FROM instructors WHERE id = #{id})
